data.title: AE Techron
data.meta_description: Learn more about AE Techron! How we started and our continuing focus on providing high-quality power supplies, linear and switch-mode power amplifiers, and EMC test systems.
data.text:
Beginnings

AE Techron, was founded as Audio Electronics Inc., in August of 1992, by former employees of the Techron division of Crown.

Our purpose has been to create high-quality, durable electronic products for research, the military and industryâincluding EMC testing, MRI/NMR and the energy sector..

Out of this work has come lines of reliable power amplifiers, test systems and testing/ easurement products, and an inventory of electronic building blocks that helps us to provide quick-to-market custom electronic solutions for our customers.

Our Core Values

Do what is right for the customer, the employee, the supplier, and the community.

Bring your hands, your head, your heart, and your person to work.

This is a safe place for everyone to work, succeed, fail, and learn.

Our Capabilities

AE Techron is a recognized world leader in the design and manufacture of precision, audio bandwidth industrial power amplifiers and EMC product safety compliance test systems. We provide comprehensive solutions for power quality, conducted immunity, and induced susceptibility testing for Automotive, Aviation, and Telecom industries. With a focus on modular testing systems and configurable amplifier solutions for difficult requirements, we consistently meet the challenges of the EMC industry with innovative design and exacting performance.

Steady Growth

AE Techron has grown steadily since its beginnings and now consists of four separate product and service areas:

AE Techron standard power supplies, power amplifiers, and test systems.

AE Techron custom design and manufacturing services.

Repair of Techron and AE Techron products.

Repair of Crown legacy audio products and JBL powered speakers.
